result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
